eu.wauz.wauzstarter

Class SeasonalSurvivalManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.wauz.wauzstarter.SeasonalSurvivalManager

  • public class SeasonalSurvivalManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to create a new world when a Survival season starts. It is used once a day on server startup.
    Author:
    Wauzmons

    • Method Detail

      • generateSurvivalWorld

        public static void generateSurvivalWorld()
        Loads the current Survival world or starts a new one, if it is outdated or has no Season.yml file.

      • updateSurvivalWorld

        private static void updateSurvivalWorld()
        Sets up all properties of the current Survival world. This includes the spawn, season file and gamerules.

        Returns:

      • getSurvivalSeasonFile
